TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit HebrewCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 表示犹太历。

span.span: Represents the Hebrew calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Hebrew 日历识别两个纪元： 建The Hebrew calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.E. （在之前基督纪元中） 和上午(before the common era) and A.M. （拉丁语"Anno Mundi"，这意味着"年的世界"）。(Latin "Anno Mundi", which means "the year of the world"). 此实现类识别当前纪元 (A.M.) 和希伯来语年份 5343 到 5999 (即公历 1583年至 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the current era (A.M.) and the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). > [!NOTE] > 有关使用信息类和其他日历.NET Framework 中的类，请参阅[使用日历](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 在每个 19 年周期的结尾的年份，则可被 19、 第三、 6、 8 日，第 11、 14，17 日和 19 年是闰年。In every 19-year cycle that ends with a year that is evenly divisible by 19, the 3rd, 6th, 8th, 11th, 14th, 17th, and 19th years are leap years. 年可以 353 为 355 天，具体取决于犹太节日的位置。A common year can have from 353 to 355 days, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 闰年可以有 383 到 385 天。A leap year can have from 383 to 385 days. Hebrew 日历具有 12 个月在平年，在闰年的 13 个月：The Hebrew calendar has 12 months during common years and 13 months during leap years: |GetMonth 值 （年）GetMonth value (common year)|GetMonth 值 （闰年）GetMonth value (leap year)|月份Month|在平年中的天Days in common years|中的日闰年Days in leap years| |------------------------------------|----------------------------------|-----------|--------------------------|------------------------| |11|11|תשרי (Tishrei)תשרי (Tishrei)|3030|3030| |22|22|חשון (Cheshvan)חשון (Cheshvan)|29/3029/30|29/3029/30| |33|33|כסלו (Kislev)כסלו (Kislev)|29/3029/30|29/3029/30| |44|44|טבת tevet （月）טבת (Tevet)|2929|2929| |55|55|שבט (Shevat)שבט (Shevat)|3030|3030| |66|-|אדר （闰阿达尔）אדר (Adar)|2929|-| |-|66|אדר א (闰阿达尔 Alef)אדר א (Adar Alef)|-|3030| |-|77|אדר ב （闰阿达尔月）אדר ב (Adar Beit)|-|2929| |77|88|ניסן (Nissan)ניסן (Nissan)|3030|3030| |88|99|אייר (Iyar)אייר (Iyar)|2929|2929| |99|1010|סיון (Sivan)סיון (Sivan)|3030|3030| |1010|1111|תמוז (Tamuz)תמוז (Tamuz)|2929|2929| |1111|1212|אב (Av)אב (Av)|3030|3030| |1212|1313|אלול (Elul)אלול (Elul)|2929|2929| 在 Cheshvan 和 Kislev 天犹太节日的位置而异。The days in Cheshvan and Kislev vary depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 在闰年，闰阿达尔替换为通过闰阿达尔 Alef 30 天试用期和闰阿达尔月 29 天。During leap years, Adar is replaced by Adar Alef with 30 days and Adar Beit with 29 days. 闰阿达尔 Alef 被视为的闰月。Adar Alef is considered the leap month. 天; leap 闰阿达尔 Alef 和所有将被视为闰阿达尔月中的星期几名称的最后一天即方法将返回`true`这些天。The last day of Adar Alef and all the days in Adar Beit are considered leap days; that is, the method returns `true` for these days. 日期公元 2001 年 1 月 1 日The date January 1, 2001 A.D. 在公历日历等同于一年的第六个天提别月 5761 A.M.in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the sixth day of Tevet in the year 5761 A.M. 在希伯来日历。in the Hebrew calendar. 每个支持一组的日历。Each supports a set of calendars. 属性返回区域性的默认日历和属性返回一个数组，包含所有支持的区域性的日历。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要更改使用的日历，该应用程序应设置的属性到新。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new . ## Examples 以下示例创建一个文件包含支持的日期范围类，并将显示在一 5772 年中的每个月的天数。The following example creates a file that contains the date ranges supported by the class, and displays the number of days in each month of the year 5772. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.hebrewcalendar.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.hebrewcalendar.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 该示例实例化对象，并使它希伯来语 （以色列） 的当前日历对象。The example instantiates a object and makes it the current calendar of a Hebrew (Israel) object. 因此，可以通过希伯来语 （以色列） 当前线程区域性。It then makes Hebrew (Israel) the current thread culture. 这会导致公共语言运行时来解释所有日期和时间相对于希伯来历。This causes the common language runtime to interpret all dates and times in relation to the Hebrew calendar.

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现类识别希伯来年份 5343 到 5999 (即公历 1583年至 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). 所产生的日部分如果结果的日期不是结果生成的年的月份中的有效日期影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它已更改为生成的年在生成每月最后一个有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所生成的年份部分受影响，如果结果的月份之外的指定年份。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此实现支持仅为当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年之外的指定纪元，且引发。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 所生成的时间的日部分保持不变，与指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，如果指定的月份是 Av，包含 30 天，指定的日期是该月的第 30 天和的值`months`参数为 5、 生成的年是某个多个指定的年份、 生成每个月是 tevet 月，并且结果的日期是 t他 29 日，即 tevet 月的最后一天。For example, if the specified month is Av, which has 30 days, the specified day is the 30th day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 5, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is Tevet, and the resulting day is the 29th day, which is the last day in Tevet. 如果的值`months`参数为负，从而早于指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 所返回的属性值始终等于。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以保留的属性`time`参数通过调用方法，如以下示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的多个组件的值方面希伯来历。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hebrew calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hebrewcalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CS/hebrewcalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/VB/hebrewcalendar_addget.vb#1)]

is less than -120,000 or greater than 120,000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现类识别希伯来年份 5343 到 5999 (即公历 1583年至 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). 所产生的日部分如果结果的日期不是结果生成的年的月份中的有效日期影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它已更改为生成的年在生成每月最后一个有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 例如，对于 Cheshvan 可以有 29 或 30 天，具体取决于犹太节日的位置。For example, Cheshvan can have 29 or 30 days, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 假设 Cheshvan 具有在当前年份中的 30 天试用期和 29 中下一年。Suppose that Cheshvan has 30 days in the current year and 29 in the following year. 如果指定的日期是当前年份中的 Cheshvan 的 30 天和的值`years`为 1，则得到的日期将在下一年中的 Cheshvan 29 日。If the specified date is the 30th day of Cheshvan in the current year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date will be the 29th day of Cheshvan in the following year. 所生成的月份部分如果结果月份不是有效生成的年中每月受影响。The month part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is not a valid month in the resulting year. 它已更改为生成的年中最后一个有效的月份。It is changed to the last valid month in the resulting year. 例如，如果中的月份`time`参数是闰年第 13 个月和的值`years`为 1，在随后出现月是下一年，为非-闰年第 12 个月。For example, if the month in the `time` parameter is the 13th month of a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the month in the resulting is the 12th month of the following year, which is a non-leap year. 请注意，即使不会更改的月份部分，它可能仍引用到不同的月份。Note that even when the month part does not change, it might still refer to a different month. 例如，闰阿达尔月是闰年，在第 7 个月，但 Nissan 第 7 个月的共同以年为单位。For example, Adar Beit is the 7th month in leap years, but Nissan is the 7th month in common years. 此实现支持仅为当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年之外的指定纪元，且引发。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 所生成的时间的日部分保持不变，与指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 如果`years`为负，从而早于指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 所返回的属性值始终等于。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以保留的属性`time`参数通过调用方法，如以下示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的多个组件的值方面希伯来历。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hebrew calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hebrewcalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CS/hebrewcalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/VB/hebrewcalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Hebrew 日历识别两个纪元： 建The Hebrew calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.E. （在之前基督纪元中） 和上午(before the common era) and A.M. （拉丁语"Anno Mundi"，这意味着"年的世界"）。(Latin "Anno Mundi", which means "the year of the world"). 此实现类识别当前纪元 (A.M.)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the current era (A.M.). 此属性始终返回具有只有一个元素的数组。This property always returns an array with only one element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一年中的一天被指从一年的第一天的天数。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，对的第一个月的第一天返回 1，并的上个月的最后一天返回该年份的总天数，这相同的值返回。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by . 此实现类识别希伯来年份 5343 到 5999 (即公历 1583年至 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的多个组件的值方面希伯来历。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hebrew calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hebrewcalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CS/hebrewcalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/VB/hebrewcalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，此方法返回 29 或 30 个 Cheshvan，具体取决于犹太节日的位置。For example, this method returns 29 or 30 for Cheshvan, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 此实现类识别希伯来年份 5343 到 5999 (即公历 1583年至 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用`GetDaysInMonth`为每个纪元中的五年的第二个月。The following code example calls `GetDaysInMonth` for the second month in each of five years in each era. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.GetDaysInMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.GetDaysInMonth/CPP/hebrewcalendar_getdaysinmonth.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.GetDaysInMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.GetDaysInMonth/CS/hebrewcalendar_getdaysinmonth.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.GetDaysInMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.GetDaysInMonth/VB/hebrewcalendar_getdaysinmonth.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Hebrew 日历识别两个纪元： 建The Hebrew calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.E. （在之前基督纪元中） 和上午(before the common era) and A.M. （拉丁语"Anno Mundi"，这意味着"年的世界"）。(Latin "Anno Mundi", which means "the year of the world"). 此实现类识别当前纪元 (A.M.) 和希伯来语 5343 年到 5999 (即公历 1583年至 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the current era (A.M.) and only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的多个组件的值方面希伯来历。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hebrew calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hebrewcalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CS/hebrewcalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/VB/hebrewcalendar_addget.vb#1)]

summary.span: 计算指定纪元年份的闰月。

span.span: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.

span.span: A positive integer that indicates the leap month in the specified year and era.

returns.span: 如果 和 参数指定闰年，则返回值为 7；如果不是闰年，则为 0。

span.span: The return value is 7 if the and parameters specify a leap year, or 0 if the year is not a leap year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在日历中支持闰月的概念，特定月后或在一年中的任何月份之后发生的闰月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如，方法返回一个数字，介于 1 到 13，该值指示指定日期与关联的月份之间。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果，在一年的第八个和第九个月之间存在闰月方法的第八个月内，闰第 8 个月的 9 和 10 中的第九个月返回 8。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

span.span: is not or .
-or-

exception.span: 小于犹太历年份 5343 或大于犹太历年份 5999。

span.span: is less than the Hebrew calendar year 5343 or greater than the Hebrew calendar year 5999.

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现类识别希伯来年份 5343 到 5999 (即公历 1583年至 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). 在每个 19 年周期的结尾的年份，则可被 19、 第三、 6、 8 日，第 11、 14，17 日和 19 年是闰年。In every 19-year cycle that ends with a year that is evenly divisible by 19, the 3rd, 6th, 8th, 11th, 14th, 17th, and 19th years are leap years. 年可以 353 为 355 天，具体取决于犹太节日的位置。A common year can have from 353 to 355 days, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 闰年可以有 383 到 385 天。A leap year can have from 383 to 385 days. 闰日是仅在闰年中发生一天。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 在希伯来日历闰阿达尔 Alef 和所有将被视为闰阿达尔月中的星期几名称的最后一天 leap 几天。In the Hebrew calendar, the last day of Adar Alef and all the days in Adar Beit are considered leap days. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用`IsLeapDay`中每个纪元的五年的第二个月 （年 2 月） 的最后一天。The following code example calls `IsLeapDay` for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/hebrewcalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/hebrewcalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/hebrewcalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现类识别希伯来年份 5343 到 5999 (即公历 1583年至 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). 在每个 19 年周期的结尾的年份，则可被 19、 第三、 6、 8 日，第 11、 14，17 日和 19 年是闰年。In every 19-year cycle that ends with a year that is evenly divisible by 19, the 3rd, 6th, 8th, 11th, 14th, 17th, and 19th years are leap years. 年可以 353 为 355 天，具体取决于犹太节日的位置。A common year can have from 353 to 355 days, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 闰年可以有 383 到 385 天。A leap year can have from 383 to 385 days. 闰月是整月，仅在闰年中发生。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 在希伯来历闰阿达尔月是唯一的闰月。In the Hebrew calendar, Adar Beit is the only leap month. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用`IsLeapMonth`中的当前纪元中的五年的每月。The following code example calls `IsLeapMonth` for all the months in five years in the current era. summary.span: 获取 类型支持的最早日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the earliest date and time supported by the type.

value.span: 最早日期和时间受类型，等效于 1 月，1，1583 公元的那一刻

span.span: The earliest date and time supported by the type, which is equivalent to the first moment of January, 1, 1583 C.E.
in the Gregorian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Visual Basic 表示时间上支持的最小日期的指定时间为一天的类型，即公历公元 0001 年 1 月 1 日Microsoft Visual Basic represents time of day as the specified time on the minimum date supported by the type, which is January 1, 0001 C.E. 但是，类型不支持该最小日期。However, the type does not support that minimum date. 因此，如果您调用方法来设置使用当前日历的日期时间的格式，但未指定的格式说明符，格式设置使用 ISO 8601 可排序的 ("s") 日期/时间模式而不是默认常规 ("G") 的日期/时间模式的格式说明符格式说明符。Consequently, if you call a method to format the time of day using the current calendar but you do not specify a format specifier, formatting uses the ISO 8601 sortable ("s") date/time pattern format specifier instead of the default general ("G") date/time pattern format specifier. 有关详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取的最小值和日历的最大值。The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax/CPP/hebrewcalendar_minmax.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax/CS/hebrewcalendar_minmax.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax/VB/hebrewcalendar_minmax.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回一个 ，它设置为指定纪元中的指定日期和时间。

span.span: Returns a that is set to the specified date and time in the specified era.

returns.span: 设置为当前纪元中的指定日期和时间的 。

span.span: The that is set to the specified date and time in the current era.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，因为它可以将当前日历中的任何日期转换为公历日期。The method is useful because it can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date. 公历日期，随后可用，例如，来比较不同日历中的日期或特定日历中创建等效的日期。The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar. 此实现类识别希伯来年份 5343 到 5999 (即公历 1583年至 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar).

exception.span: 、、 或 超出了当前 对象支持的范围。

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);
override this.ToFourDigitYear : int -> int

param.name: year
param.span: 一个从 0 到 99 的两位数年份，或者从 5343 到 5999 的四位数犹太历年份。

span.span: A 2-digit year from 0 through 99, or a 4-digit Hebrew calendar year from 5343 through 5999.

summary.span: 使用 属性将指定的年份转换为四位数年份，以确定相应的纪元。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a 4-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 如果 参数是两位数年份，则返回值是对应的四位数年份。

span.span: If the parameter is a 2-digit year, the return value is the corresponding 4-digit year.

returns.span: 如果 参数是四位数年份，则返回值是未更改的 参数。

span.span: If the parameter is a 4-digit year, the return value is the unchanged parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用`year`参数，属性和一年来计算的 4 位数年份。The method uses the `year` parameter, the property, and a year to calculate a 4-digit year. 通过查找的唯一匹配项来确定在世纪`year`该 100 年范围内的参数。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the `year` parameter within that 100-year range. 例如，如果设置为 5729，则 100 年范围是从 5630 到 5729。For example, if is set to 5729, the 100-year range is from 5630 to 5729. 因此，值为 30 被解释为 5630，而值为 29 解释为 5729。Therefore, a value of 30 is interpreted as 5630, while a value of 29 is interpreted as 5729. 如果属性具有特殊值 99方法将忽略区域中的设置和语言选项控制面板中，并返回的值`year`参数保持不变。If the property has the special value 99, the method ignores the settings in the regional and language options in Control Panel and returns the value of the `year` parameter unchanged. 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 传递一个两位数的年份值 (小于 100) 导致该方法将值转换为四位数字值根据值，该值表示相应的纪元。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果应用程序提供对在支持的日历范围内的四位数年份值，该方法返回的实际输入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果应用程序提供支持的日历范围之外的四位数字值或提供一个负值，则该方法将引发异常。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

span.span: is less than 0.
-or-
is less than or greater than .

.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TwoDigitYearMax : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许两位数年份，以正确转换为四位数年份。The property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，如果此属性设置为 5729，100 年范围是从 5630 为 5729。For example, if this property is set to 5729, the 100-year range is from 5630 to 5729. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 5630，而 29 一个 2 位值被解释为 5729。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 5630, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 5729. 此属性的初始值被派生自控制面板的区域和语言选项部分中的设置。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 如果初始系统设置将更改应用程序的生命周期内类不会自动检测更改。If the initial system setting changes during the life of your application the class does not automatically detect the change. 这两个特殊值 99 使方法忽略系统设置，并返回指定的年份保持不变。The special value 99 causes the method to ignore the system settings and return the specified year unchanged.

exception.span: 当前的 对象为只读。

span.span: The current object is read-only.

exception.span: 在 set 操作中，犹太历年数值小于 5343 而不是 99，或者大于 5999。

span.span: In a set operation, the Hebrew calendar year value is less than 5343 but is not 99, or the year value is greater than 5999.
